ygData.msgSnippet: Let s test how well you know your scenarios. Can you give complete answers to these questions? 1)List all the scenarios that are especially difficult for mages

Let's test how well you know your scenarios.

Can you give complete answers to these questions?

1)List all the scenarios that are especially difficult for mages and 
archmages.

2)List all the scenarios that are especially difficult for skeletons 
and ghosts.

3)List all the scenarios that are difficult for fire elementals and 
large slime.

Obviously, you have to figure out what type of scenarios I am talking 
about with each question.
